name: Soulstopia -PHI
description:
Soulstopia Φ is a wave-based action arcade game where you set the ill-fated free using various attacks!





A realm between heaven and hell, a stopping point for those at-odds with their demise. Suddenly pulled out of their lives, these restless spirits arrived in Soulstopia — to be set free by a lonesome maiden.





▸A combat system with various options.
▸Five stages where you slice through waves of enemies.
▸Story scenes displayed in a visual novel format.
▸Journal entries that provide more insight into the world.
▸Color customization featuring nine unique palettes.
